title: adhi madyanta rahithEy
sahitya:
Adi madhyAnta rahitE! shivE! param
jyOti swarUpa cidAnanda vibhavE
(Adi)                 


anupallavi

ati karuNAmaya kAtyAyaNi!
shruti laya bhAva niratE! nitya kalyANi
(Adi)   


caraNam

Apatalanu aNaci tappaga pAlimcu
goppa deivamu nIvanucu
nI pada padmamu niratamu kolicina
nAvetalanu tIrcu nArAyaNi gowri
(Adi)
